description.value:
At 3rd level, your study of the bits of knowledge, wive's tales, and forgotten stories allows you to learn spells that increase your preparation for the unknown. You can prepare these spells when you are the appropriate bard level.

Spell LevelSpells
1st@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.DVQtVWLYBaVkqvxn]{Detect Evil and Good}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.9e94l4tOJY3Ubaix]{Protection from Evil and Good}
2nd@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.RvEqsD89Zvd5yex4]{Arcanist's Magic Aura}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.ap4dmtshjEbwU3Ts]{Rope Trick}
3rd@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.MlSRJfZbIazF0aYF]{Magic Circle}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.MDbAnl6BDevq2FQV]{Protection from Energy}
4th@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.pxpb2eOB6bv4phAf]{Banishment}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.XqzXSKNR75ZdYTA9]{Divination}
5th@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.IvSdXzrzRtgPTeLK]{Commune}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.K0f8PDezkFVNeA4F]{Commune with Nature}
